channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I learned a hard lesson’: My ex-husband gambled away our $900,000 life savings. Do I use my 401(k) to buy a home?
item.description: “I have about $80,000 in my 401(k) and $10,000 in savings.”

item.title: Do you have a lottery addiction? With the Powerball jackpot now at $700 million, this man’s story may be telling.
item.description: Adam Osmond gambled away a fortune on lottery games, but eventually sought help.

item.title: ‘I can only rely on me’: How do I protect myself from my parents’ nursing-home bills?
item.description: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”

item.title: ‘I’ve struggled in every way’: My brother passed away and I’m $28,000 in debt. How do I get out of this mess?
item.description: “Has my grief affected my situation? Looking back, I think it did.”

item.title: As a nurse, I’ve seen people use their power of attorney to take advantage of their parents. It would chill you to the bone.
item.description: “Even if someone has millions of dollars in retirement, that won’t keep them from being trapped in the hospital.”

item.title: Medtronic makes two key additions to its board. How activist Elliott can build shareholder value
item.description: The stage seems to be set for a long-term mutually beneficial relationship between the parties.

item.title: Why Morgan Stanley says the market and the economy are telling 'diverging' stories
item.description: U.S. stocks have proven resilient even as the Trump administration haphazardly implements policy changes, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Bank of America says these five stocks have room to run
item.description: Bank of America named five stocks to buy right now.

item.title: Ether notches first new record since 2021 after Powell speech teasing rate cuts
item.description: The price of ether smashed through its 2021 record on Friday after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell hinted at upcoming rate cuts.

item.title: Buy these outperforming stocks with room to run, says UBS
item.description: As earnings season winds down, investors should be on the lookout for some stocks that might still have room for upside, according to UBS.
